title: Rat Problem
description: The village cellar is overrun with giant rats. Please clear them out for us. We will reward you well.

title: Special Delivery
description: Take this sealed letter to the Mayor in the next town. Do not open it.

title: A Gift for Laura
description: Alicia wants to give something special to Laura. Find a 'Sparkling Gem' in the dungeon and bring it back to her.

title: Golden Ambition
description: Laura needs raw gold for a special project. Defeat the Golden Skeleton in the lower dungeon and bring back its ring.
